name: PCKG_CALC_SALARY
body_snippet:
package body PCKG_CALC_SALARY is
/*****************************************************************************************
Salary computation is now handling the change of DATE during the Salary Period.
e.g if the period is from 01-Feb-2004 to 29-Feb-2004 then the SAALRY_GROUP with 
GRADE can be chaged between these dates.

** EOBI(Employer), EOBI(Employee), PFT and Income Tax etc, there are not 
seperate Fields for these values in the table, These values are also 
stored in the same Fashion as are the other values. e.g like in COL_1, COL_2.
When Report on some of these values would be required in future, User would 
also input the Salary Template and from that Salary Template we would 
guess the No of Column which is has stored the PFT or EOBI etc.

Flow of This Procedure is as Follows

a) <PRO_POP_TMPLT_CNSTNTS>

  1->First of all the PAY_TEMP_SAL_GRP_TMPLT_MT table is populated for 
     master Template Constants e.g Emp Code, Emp Name Total Days Worked etc.
  
  2->After this PAY_TEMP_SAL_GRP_TMPLT_DET table is populated for Detail
     records e.g the No of Records in this table would be equal to No of 
     records in PAY_EMP_TRANSFER_MT + 1 with FROM_DATE and TO_DATE of 
     Employee on Each Designation
     
  3->Each Entry in PAY_TEMP_SAL_GRP_TMPLT_DET table may have the BADLI in it,
     The BADLI days are populated with the LINE_ID <PK> of 
     PAY_TEMP_SAL_GRP_TMPLT_DET table in 
     PAY_TEMP_SAL_GRP_TMPLT_BADLI
